function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sufficient area for social distancing in houses","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within households","Mitigation":"Reconfigure indoor spaces or invest in outdoor spaces to allow for social distancing","Technologies":"3D modeling software for space reconfiguration, outdoor space design tools","People":"Residents, household members","Owner":"Homeowners, housing developers, city planners"},{"Description":"Poor indoor environmental quality in houses","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and poor health outcomes","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation and access to sunlight, invest in air purification systems","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, air quality sensors, UVGI air disinfection systems","People":"Residents, household members","Owner":"Homeowners, housing developers, building managers"},{"Description":"Dissatisfaction with floor area in houses","Impact":"Difficulty maintaining social distancing within the household, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Design or invest in larger housing units, encourage the use of outdoor spaces for separation","Technologies":"Architectural design software, outdoor space design tools","People":"Residents, household members","Owner":"Homeowners, housing developers"}]}
